          <title>
            <string language="en">Ionisation of atoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ionisierung der Atome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ionisation des atomes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ionisation dos átomos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ionizzazione degli atomi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιονισμός των ατόμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ionización de átomos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how metal atoms lose outer electrons to become ions.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive charge</string>
          </keyword>

            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Metallatome äußere 
Elektronen verlieren, um Ionen zu werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les atomes en 
métal détruisent les électrons externes pour devenir des ions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como os átomos do metal
perdem elétrons exteriores para se transformar íons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come gli atomi del 
metallo perdono gli elettroni esterni per transformarsi in in ioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς τα άτομα μετάλλων 
χάνουν τα εξωτερικά ηλεκτρόνια για να γίνουν ιόντα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo los átomos del 
metal pierden electrones externos para convertirse en iones.</string>
          </description>
